Text: Just out of curiosity, here... Are you a member of the group that releases these, a founding member of the Moviex site, or just someone who uploads their torrents elsewhere?  I just noticed that lately whenever there's a new torrent on moviex.info, it's not long before the same torrent is posted here.. by you.  I've yet to look into moviex's rules and such, but private trackers generally don't like their stuff posted around on public sites.
who cares!!! just download the film and stop asking ridiculous questions!!
So its ok to steal from the moviemakers but not from the guys who ripped it...
whoo whoo thats the sound of the police!
